SEARCH
Package Controllers

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
Controllers.GameEngine
public class GameEngine extends Object
Context of the State pattern. It contains a State object (in this example the State class is the class Phase).

      returns the game phase

    • start

      public void start() throws FileNotFoundException
      This method will ask the user: 1. What part of the game they want to start with (edit map or play game). Depending on the choice, the state will be set to a different object, which will set different behavior. 2. What command they want to execute from the game. Depending on the state of the GameEngine, each command will potentially have a different behavior.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException

    • getConnectivity

      public Connectivity getConnectivity()
      This method gets the connectivity object
      Returns:
      returns the map content

    • setConnectivity

      public void setConnectivity(Connectivity connectivity)
      This function sets the map content.
      Parameters:
      connectivity - - holds values of the continent country neighbor
